programme.title: Pinocchio
programme.desc: Inspiring the world to believe that dreams really can come true, comes this enchanting take on the timeless and much adored classic. When a piece of pine-wood falls into the hands of the poor old toy-maker Geppetto, he carves it into a puppet named Pinocc

programme.title: In The Doghouse
programme.desc: When a divorced mom tries to start dating again, her kids and her dog set out to sabotage the dates. They are successful until her high school sweetheart shows up. He's onto them as they conduct a comedic battle to sway their mom's heart away from her high school sweetheart back to their father.

programme.title: Forever in My Heart
programme.desc: Jenna and Charlie found love in Ireland but their dreams drove them apart. Five years later, they reunite and Jenna has to decide where her heart belongs - back home or in the Emerald Isle?

programme.title: Cooking Up Love
programme.desc: On a lark, Zoey rents a food truck and enters a reality TV competition. Heat rises between her and the handsome founder of a fast food chain, but when Zoey finds out he’s a judge in the contest, things quickly fizzle. Zoey’s determined to win fair and square and she suspects Mr-Too-Good-To-Be-True is really after her sauce recipe, not her heart.

programme.title: Love Me Like You Do
programme.desc: A modern day train hopper fighting to be a successful musician and a single mom battling to maintain custody of her daughter defy their circumstances by coming together in a relationship that may change each other's lives forever.

programme.title: Metal Tornado
programme.desc: An American company inadvertently unleashes a magnetic vortex on an unprepared world. The earth's upper atmosphere is supercharged by a monstrous solar flare creating massive magnetic vortexes that shoot down to Earth in the form of giant tornados. These magnetic tornados begin drawing all metal objects into themselves, pulverizing everything in their path as they tear across the planet!

programme.title: Cut
programme.desc: A group of film students are determined to finish their horror movie that was forced to stop production after the death of their director (Kylie Minogue). But what they don't realise is that every attempt to complete the movie has ended with the vicious murder of all involved.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: A Florida couple holding minimum-wage jobs deal with an unexpected pregnancy. AKA Sunlight Jr.

programme.title: Rock-A-Doodle
programme.desc: An iconic family favourite from legendary director Don Bluth and featuring the voice of Oscar Winner Christopher Plummer. A contemporary take on the classic fish-out-of-water story as a rooster, who is tricked in to leaving town to seek fame as an Elvis-style Las Vegas singer, teams up with a young boy and a group of barnyard animals on a magical journey to defeat the Grand Duke of Owls.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S01:E01 - British Colombia Moose
programme.desc: Meet Laramy Sasquatch Miller, one of the last mountain men of the Rocky Mountains. Follow Laramy as he attempts to harvest a huge Canadian moose.Born of Indian ancestry and trained by true Mountain Men, Laramy Sasquatch Miller uses only a handmade bow and a traditional .54 caliber Hawken Rifle to travel the route the mountain men did. From deep in the Canadian Rockies to the plains of the Midwest hunting, trapping and surviving off the land.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S01:E02 - Grizzly Part 1
programme.desc: Big game or small Laramy knows he possesses the time honoured skills to keep himself fed but now he is looking to hunt the fiercest of all - a real man-eater - the Grizzly.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E06 - Training Day
programme.desc: Island Air is the lifeline to many in Kodiak. Sometimes the violent weather prevents the planes from landing so Erik takes the day to teach Pete how to use the camera hatch for a little target practice.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E02 - Long Days, Cold Nights
programme.desc: The Keefer brothers awaken to a frozen tundra. With over 8 miles to cover and no oars, the brothers are forced to trudge their way through shallow water and barren earth as they head downstream in search of their second cache.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E09 - Private Military Contractors
programme.desc: This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battlefield. Using its “sub-second” analysis techniques and intimate first-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of today’s “soldiers for hire” and how private armies are re-shaping the way conflicts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E13 - Who is the King?
programme.desc: It is estimated that there are approximately 8.7 million different species of animals on Earth. Each has developed unique, specific and often deadly survival techniques and skills for survival. How do we choose a favourite from such a vast array of spectacular and beautiful creatures?

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E13 - Barbados and Lake Como
programme.desc: Barbados has it all. Home to The Cliff, one of the world’s most famous restaurants where sharks swim in the floodlit bay and entertain diners. Considered by many to be the best of the Caribbean Islands it is home to media moguls and pop princesses alike. Italy’s Lake Como also plays host to a number of famous Hollywood stars and directors who’ve fallen in love with its breath-taking vistas and fabulous cuisine.

programme.desc: 60 miles offshore, surrounded by multiple mako and blue sharks, Manny Puig has the most thrilling shark encounters of his life.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S01:E03 - Grizzly Part 2
programme.desc: Laramy's hunt for the Grizzly, also known as the North American Brown Bear continues. Weighing in at an average of 130 - 180 kilos for a female and and between 180 to 360 kilos for a male the Grizzly is a worthy opponent.

programme.title: Sasquatch Mountain Man - S01:E04 - Colorado Lion
programme.desc: In Colorado, lions will generally be most abundant in areas with plentiful deer and individual lions range in areas varying in size from 10 to 370 square miles. Laramy will have his work cut out hunting them.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots - S01:E07 - Surf's Up
programme.desc: Rough seas have a couple of surfers turning to Island Air for an adventure of a life time.

programme.title: Dropped - S05:E03 - Choke Point
programme.desc: The terrain begins to change as the Keefer brothers are forced to pick their way downstream. The landscape tightens it's grip and funnels the brothers to a geographic choke point where both predator and prey gather.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle - S01:E10 - Close Protection
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conflict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traffic, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation.

programme.title: Wild Ones - S01:E01 - Dangerous on Land
programme.desc: This episode offers an exciting look at nature with close-ups of wild cats, snakes, crocodiles, scorpions, etc., focusing on the animals' methods of defense or predation (venom, teeth, claws, size, etc.). In this episode you will learn all about the wild world of dangerous animals

Transición de dos años – Lorena finalizó sus estudios de medicina y está de guardia en la emergencia de un hospital. Paco aparece allí para decirle que está dispuesto a decir todo lo que sabe y la joven reacciona decepcionada de que él pretenda revelar la verdad después de tanto tiempo; sin embargo quiere escuchar lo que él vino a decirle.

programme.title: No EPG data available
programme.desc: No summary available

Gertrudis llama a Michelle para que se deshaga del cuerpo sin vida de Paco. Para ella fue muy fácil matar por segunda vez, al punto de sentirse muy tranquila y afirmar que de esa manera resuelve los problemas con gran rapidez. Norma descubre todo, pero no está dispuesta a ser cómplice de un asesinato - Omar recibe una llamada que lo descompone, unos agentes de la policía encontraron el cadáver de Paco.

Gertrudis le da la noticia a Alfonso y José Pablo que ya están liberando a Malena, quien sale en ese momento y abraza a su madre y le da las gracias por lo que hizo. Alberto y Lorena se encuentran en un café, él la citó allí pues necesitaba verla a solas.

El Ama de Llaves confronta a Lorena para que reconozca que aún ama a Alberto y ella evade diciendo que es novia de Omar. Luego es Lorena quien confronta a Norma para que diga la verdad de lo que sabe, y esta última, aunque aterrada, termina por confesarle que Gertrudis sí asesinó a Paco; pero no puede decir nada porque la tiene amenazada de muerte.

Al abrir una gaveta, Malena encuentra un portarretratos con el cristal roto, con una vieja foto de ella e Isabel. Alfonso llega y la descubre, pero Malena reacciona con mucha molestia hacia él – Norma está a punto de salir de la habitación, con el arma escondida dentro de una cesta de ropa sucia, cuando es sorprendida por la llegada de Gertrudis.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: Camila y Rosa juran que ahora nada ní nadie las podrá separar. Rosa quiere reunirse con su hermana, la Madre Isabel. Rosa, a solas con su hermana, muestra su verdadero rostro: fría, aplomada y sobre todo vengativa. Las dos hermanas se enfrentan por lo que desean para Camila.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: Max entiende ahora el por qué Camila no se casó con él. Max y Camila se reúnen con Rosa. Rosa Blanco y Fausto planean aliarse para hundir a Ezequiel, pero él no le tiene confianza y cree que es una trampa para él y por eso decide aliarse también con Ezequiel, con el propósito de asesinar a Rosa.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: El inspector Torrealba exige que Rosa declare sobre lo sucedido en el pasado crimen de Leoncio López Méndez. Con dolor revive los momentos en que llegó Ezequiel y asesinó a Leoncio y luego, se retiró del lugar sin ninguna clase de remordimiento. Fausto y Ezequiel continúan con su plan de asesinar a Rosa Blanco para que no cuente lo que sabe.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: Durante un evento en Mascarada Rosa es recibida por Camila a disfrutar ver reunidos en un mismo lugar a todos sus enemigos. Ezequiel y Fausto cada uno celebra la caída del otro y sólo los une la intención de matar a Rosa; Marcelina, siente temor y vergüenza; Elda, asegura que Rosa está allí para vengarse. Proyección del video que muestra como Fausto asesinó a Celso.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: Ezequiel recibe una nota de El Doliente, anticipándole su muerte. El plan contra Rosa Blanco falló. Continúa relatando los hechos del pasado; Ezequiel, obligándola a tomar el arma homicida, logró que fuera culpada por éste asesinato, por el que pagó tantos años de cárcel injusta.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Raúl se siente decepcionado de Clara Inés al creer que ella tiene una relación amorosa con Edilio y Manuel Jesús.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Clara no cree que se puede enamorar de Barón, aunque admite que el joven merece el amor de cualquier mujer.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Nicolás y Raúl sorprenden a Clara con la noticia que está detenida por participar en negocios ilícitos, pero ésta les aclara la confusión.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Misael se niega hacerle el amor a Pastora porque ésta lo abandonó por ambicionar el amor y el dinero de Israel.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Ante lo comentado por Tamara, Clara Inés descubre que campos no tiene problemas con su dentadura.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Chiqui finge indignación, pero eso no hace cambiar de idea a Orestes. Se siente perdida, ya que si el protagonista descubre su farsa, la separación será inminente.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Hecha un mar de lágrimas, Bella se convence que Orestes es un amor imposible. Lo mejor es olvidarlo para siempre.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Entre la discusión, Franklin sujeta con fuerza a Chiqui mientras le insinúa que está celosa de Bella, porque hasta su esposo la prefiere. Desconfiado, Orestes los sorprende.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Valentina cree que Orestes ha vuelto a jugar con sus sentimientos por lo que debe olvidarlo. En eso es sorprendida por el Lirio de Plata quien asegura que desea partirle el alma a quien la hace tan infeliz.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Franklin le informa a Bella que debe acompañarlo a la comisaría.
Alberto se entera que la mujer es la mamá del ex de Lorena, y quiere sacarle dinero. Alberto confronta a Lorena, pidiéndole que le diga toda la verdad sobre Nilda.

Una vez más, Malena es víctima de los celos y la furia de Pablo, quien la toma del cabello y la arrastra reclamándole “su infidelidad” con Alfonso. Ricardo ríe por la manera tan fácil que engañó a las Marías. Omar tratando de cuadrar la historia en torno al sicario. Entre promesas de amor y la pasión que los consume, Lorena y Alberto se entregan en cuerpo y alma.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella
programme.desc: Franklin detiene a Orestes. El joven es sospechoso de una serie de robos; afirman creer que Orestes Villanueva es el Lirio de Plata.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Pastora le dice a todos los de la casa que Clara Inés no puede entrar nunca más a la casa, y le grita que se largue.

Lorena se reúne con Alberto en un café y él aprovecha para informarle que su relación con Patricia se acabó. Ya Lorena lo sabía, lo citó para contarle que Norma encontró el arma con que Gertrudis mató a Paco y a Marco Aurelio - El psiquiatra de Virginia emitirá un informe favorable, considera que ella está apta para criar a su hijo - Omar descubre a Lorena reunida con Alberto y los celos se apoderan de él.

programme.title: El Desprecio
programme.desc: Amado amenaza a Lucely con matarla por detenerlo ante Raúl, Octavia y la policía. Linares implora a Caballero que le perdone la vida.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje
programme.desc: Ezequiel trata de abusar de Camila, una mano enguantada lo golpea. Todos culpan a Camila y ella se defiende diciendo que no vio al asesino. Torrealba insiste en interrogarla. Todos: Octavia, Astrid, Max, Marcelina, Leandro, Gregorio y hasta Sebastián tenían motivos para matar a Ezequiel. Sólo queda detenido Max, como presunto autor material del hecho.

programme.title: Mi Gorda Bella

programme.title: El Desprecio

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Ferrari's California T model heralded a new era for the Italian sports car manufacturer. After its facelift the T was the first Ferrari with a turbo engine since the iconic F40 which was built until 1992. Even manufacturers like Ferrari can’t avoid some downsizing once in a while, given this exclusive but highly competitive market segment.

programme.title: Porsche Cayenne E-Hybrid
programme.desc: Porsche presented the latest version of its luxury SUV Cayenne in southern France. The E-Hybrid combines the best of two worlds: it's very agile but can also drive short distances purely electrically.

programme.title: Joseph Stalin's ZIS 110
programme.desc: James Bond still didn't have a license to kill, when this representative Russian vehicle called ZIS 110 rolled off the production line in 1949. The 110 was developed by reverse engineering a 1942 Packard Super Eight.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Ernest finds out if the Suzuki Eeco makes a suitable camper van. GWM and Chery reveal a host of new models at Auto China and Juliet hits the town in Toyota’s Urban Cruiser.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: Vehicles from Audi, Kia and Hyundai come under the spotlight. We find replacement for a Renault Captur 1.2T and we compare fuel consumption between Suzuki Jimny models

programme.title: Sold in 60 seconds
programme.desc: Today on Sold in 60 Seconds, the roof comes off. A British sports cars classic, the Triumph TR6, is going under the hammer.

programme.title: Petrolheads
programme.desc: We get a sneak peek of the upcoming Concours South Africa. A tuned VW Golf R steals the spotlight. Sbu chats to Lorenzo Gualtieri of SavSpeed and Matthew takes the Ford Mustang for a spin.

programme.title: Cupra Formentor VZ5 Abt, Cupra Born and Extreme E
programme.desc: Almost every manufacturer has a luxury or sports offshoot. Seat only entered the market in 2018 with its Cupra sports brand and is putting in an impressive performance. We reveal the secret of its success.

programme.title: Ferrari 488 Spider
programme.desc: Ferrari cars have their origin on the race track. Traditionally, a these sports cars operated with a noisy natural aspirated engine. To equip a Ferrari Spider with a V8 turbo engine was a bold step towards the future.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nowadays people associate the name Bentley with elegance and luxury, but the British brand also has another side. Since its establishment in 1919, Bentley consistently drew attention via its ongoing success in motor sports. The limited edition Continental GT3-R with less weight and more power than the regular model was one of the iconic manufacturer's sportiest cars ever.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: For more than 50 years the Porsche 911 has been holding the crown as one of the best sports cars in the world. But the competition still tries to overthrow the champion. Two manufacturers recently jousted with the 911 in order to lure customers away. The Jaguar F-Type R and the Mercedes AMG GT S are the Porsche’s strongest rivals.

programme.title: Cadillac Escalade
programme.desc: The Cadillac Escalade at first seems like a typical rather beefy American car, but this luxurious SUV is more of a lovable, gentle giant, that should be able to gain sympathy with its clientele.

programme.title: Arden AJ23
programme.desc: A Jaguar that is able to terrify the world alone with its roar. This Jaguar F-Type R tuned by Arden is a real bad boy. Already in the series production configuration, the F-Type R Coupe is a dream car that can really bite but this Jaguar which has been upgraded from Arden, now calls itself "AJ23“ and is more powerful, louder and more aggressive than any of his brothers.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The BMW M3 and the Mercedes C63 AMG, the top models of the two iconic manufacturers are in an ever-lasting competition. But they are not alone in their battle for the crown. A exotic beast from Japan lies in wait, the Lexus RC F. Is this Japanese extrovert a threat to its German competitors?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Aston Martin Vanquish is timelessly elegant and carries the strongest engine of the British brand under its hood, a roaring V12. True British power. Also: the tuning company Arden gave a Jaguar a power treatment and transformed the F-Type R to their Arden AJ23 model with breathtaking 650hp. And: a sporty rarity from a traditional manufacturer, the Morgan AR P4 roadster.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Lamborghini Huracan with its V10 is brutal, but there are still some people who think that even that isn't enough power yet. Therefore, the Swiss tuning company O.CT turned this raging bull into an even more furious beast. Also: the Cadillac CTS-V had been under pressure from the get-go. At first glance is looks like a regular limousine, but at a second glance it reveals its monstrous power.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: All over the world, Mercedes' S-Class is considered the model range that features the most elegant and luxurious limousines. We took a look at the German manufacturer's first convertible model in this class. Also: for the Chevrolet Camaro's 50th anniversary in 2016 the US brand released the sixth generation of their classic. And: a mountain cruise with the Corvette C7 convertible.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Anybody who sees a car with a big rear wing suspects that there is a lot of power hidden under the hood that needs to be controlled, as these wings provide the necessary downforce. The Porsche GT3 RS bears a very special wing on its back. Also: the Mercedes-AMG GT S provides understatement and power at the same time. And: the even more uncompromising Radical RX C Turbo.

programme.title: Ferrari California T
programme.desc: The Ferrari California T has a lot of Italian passion and elegant lines to offer. Super sports car cabriolets are popular all over the world. It is no wonder that more and more manufacturers are 'opening up'.

programme.title: BMW 328 Schlüter
programme.desc: If a car arrives in a trailer, its value is usually very high. The original BMW 328 Schlüter is already rare and expensive. But this model is a reconstruction and it is absolutely unique.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: German convertibles like the the Porsche 911 Cabriolet or the Mercedes-AMG Roadster enjoy a worldwide reputation. They stand for perfection and reliability and are considered the embodiment of status and an expression of lifestyle and joy of life.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: British convertibles like the Jaguar F-Type, the Aston Martin V8 Vantage or the Bentley Continental are elegant and sportier than many other cars. They enjoy cult status all over the world. After all, fast open-top two-seaters were invented in the UK.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Design with stunning lines and proportions, unique engines and matchless Italian flair, sports convertibles like the Ferrari 488 Spyder, the Lamborghini Aventador Roadster or the Maserati Gran Cabrio deliver â€žgrande emozioneâ€œ.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: International luxury cabriolets by Rolls Royce, Bentley, Mercedes, Porsche and Maserati are the most exclusive cars in the world and offer more style, status and luxury than any other car.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: Open-top two-seater sports cars, super sports cabriolets by Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, Bentley and McLaren, are built for velocities exceeding 300 km/h and unparalleled driving pleasure.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s. Many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Alfa Romeo 6C 2500SS
programme.desc: Founded in 1910, the iconic Italian car manufacturer Alfa Romeo experienced a very eventful history. Their 6C 2500 SS model is right in the middle of the company's more than 100-year history. It combined new technology with an early post-war appearance.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: The Nürburgring is the place where you can really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for motor sports. This is the reason why motoring enthusiasts go there throughout the year.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: We prepared some very entertaining clips from the Nürburgring for you. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: When the weather cleared up a bit at the Nürburgring, we were finally back at the track. As soon as the snow and ice were gone the horsepower junkies returned to the ring to once again let their engines roar.

programme.title: Artega GT
programme.desc: From 2006 to 2012 the German company Artega produced their GT sports car model. Thanks to the know-how of a former Porsche and BMW manager the Artega GT was able to be manufactured in a small series.

programme.title: Ferrari California T
programme.desc: The Ferrari California T has a lot of Italian passion and elegant lines to offer. Super sports car cabriolets are popular all over the world. It is no wonder that more and more manufacturers are 'opening up'.

programme.title: Chevrolet Caprice 9C1 police car
programme.desc: This 1994 Chevrolet Caprice 9C1 is a former police car from the Los Angeles Police Department. Its curvaceous body was often mocked as looking like a whale, but this Chevy Caprice possesses the qualities of a shark.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes rehearse a car crash scene for a movie, in which it should seem as if the main character of the movie really drives the car. The team achieves this directive by using digital effects and constructing a special airbag.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Christoph looks back at the stunts of the last twelve shows and explains why a stunt sometimes works better in a test than on the film set. It's a summary of all the stunts of season 2, in addition to the best outtakes.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: After the shoot of the second season of this series, the stunt team created 13 little action movie sequences on their own that are sometimes funny, sometimes gritty, sometimes a bit mad, but always spectacular.

programme.title: Jeep Renegade
programme.desc: Jeep has been building SUVs since 1942. The Jeep Renegade comes from a traditional home. It is the youngest representative of the family and the most successful.

programme.title: Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10
programme.desc: The ice course on Lungauring, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10 in winter training. Twelve participants in six Evos were taught the art of drifting with a four-wheel drive car. We accompanied a student on his first drifting experience.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: BMW F 800 R is a robust roadster with a lot of spirit, and even motorcycle world champions count on its agility. World champion, Chris Pfeiffer is showing just how much fun you can have with a BMW F 800 R. His work motorcycle is based on the version that you can buy.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: If you decide to purchase the Volkswagen Polo GTI or Citroen's DS4 SoChic you neither have to give up convenience nor performance. Also: Nissan doesn't hold back when it comes to their luxury brand Infiniti. We took the Q50 hybrid RWD to the test.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Not only in the big cities it's a growing struggle for parking spots. . We took the BMW X6, the Citroen Cactus and the Smart forfour to town in order to find out how these cars would cope in this situation and surrounding.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Force's Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol. These aren't normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: Beradino
programme.desc: A „bella macchina“, a beautiful car - but not designed by masters like Bertone or Pininfarina. Johannes Paulussen from Neuss in Germany built the Beradino by hand.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Kati and Patrick from Munich are no longer satisfied with their 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle's 5.7-liter small block and want to buy a bigger engine. For that reason they visit the engine specialists from Down Town Garage for a proper conversion.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren/Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin take their Dragster Camaro to the airfield where high performance cars battle it out in a 1/8 mile race. Will Frank be able to defy the competition?

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: With more than 500 featured super sports cars by Lamborghini, Ferrari, Bugatti or Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the world's largest Supercar Rallye. US car fans Kati and her husband Patrick take part in this event with a brand new Chevrolet Camaro.

programme.title: Bentley Mulsanne EWB
programme.desc: The long version of the Bentley Mulsanne is a prime example of a chauffeured limousine. With it, the British luxury car brand has set the bar extremely high when it comes to automotive comfort.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: Aston Martin Rapide S
programme.desc: Aston Martin is breaking new ground with the sport sedan – the „Rapide S“. Ever since the official car of James Bond became the Aston Martin, this brand has achieved cult status. Desirable, timelessly elegant, 2-door sports coupes are the DNA. But even the venerable British brand does not escape evolution - because with the Rapide S, Aston Martin goes new ways.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Skoda Octavia, the Opel Insignia Country Tourer, the Subaru Outback, the Audi S4 allroad quattro and the Seat Leon x-perience want to be more than roomy family cars. Their offroad features show that it doesn't always have to be an SUV.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We present some of the more extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck, a Ford Raptor, a conversion of a Mercedes G-class Edition, a modified Volkswagen Touareg, a Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: With its extravagant design the Lexus NX200t definitely stands out. Infiniti, Nissan's luxury division, is more conservative in that regard. The QX30 features a classic Infiniti design with a curved bonnet. Also: the city SUV Mazda CX-3.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Three brothers from the same Volkswagen production platform: the Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people, the Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive but offers a broader range of engines, and Seat infuse the SUV segment with Spanish passion.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and the other competitors in the business class segment. Volvo take a different approach. Their S90 is captivating due to its Scandinavian design and economical four-cylinder engines.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: ORZ Vehicles, a German company specializing in the production, sale and installation of Jeep parts and accessories, makes the American off-road dream come true. A good example for this approach is the Brute, a pickup version of the Wrangler.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Seat Arona is a typical compact or mini SUV. Another pseudo off-roader is the Volkswagen T-Roc. Can the smallest Volkswagen SUV repeat the success of the best-selling Tiguan? Also: the Asian competitors Hyundai Kona, KIA Stonic and Toyota C-HR.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: BMW F 800 R is a robust roadster with a lot of spirit, and even motorcycle world champions count on its agility. World champion, Chris Pfeiffer is showing just how much fun you can have with a BMW F 800 R. His work motorcycle is based on the version that you can buy.

programme.title: Audi MTM S8 Talladega R
programme.desc: The Audi S8 Plus is by no means underpowered, but it is and remains faithful to this model series' understatement. Those who want more power can get a boost from MTM.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: No consumer good is fought over as fiercely and as cost-intensively as the car. No sooner had the first car been launched in 1886 than advertising began touting the great benefits of the motor car for mankind. Part 1 of 3.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: In the 1970s and 80s, car production booms and with it car advertising. Television advertising for cars picks up speed. Even the oil crisis cannot stop worldwide car production or the corresponding advertising. Part 2 of 3.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: In no other industry is marketing as important as in the automotive industry. Brands, models and advertising campaigns have been closely intertwined for decades. How has car advertising developed since the 1990s? Part 3 of 3.

programme.title: Cycling home from China
programme.desc: Josh spent 4 months self filming his bike trip home from the Giant bike factory in Shanghai. During his 15 000 km trip between Shanghai China and Newcastle UK, he crossed 19 countries. A fantastic human adventure and a unique bike trip !

programme.title: No EPG data available
programme.desc: No summary available

programme.title: Titan Desert Morocco 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: More than 500 brave mountain bikers from 25 countries all over the world are testing their physical and mental endurance, covering over 600 kilometers and overcoming more than 6,000 meters of accumulated altitude in six stages, from Boumalne-Dadès to Maadid, crossing the desert and facing steep climbs, dangerous descents and inhospitable terrain.

programme.title: No EPG data available
programme.desc: No summary available

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar – Castellón (Spain). The race leads through spectacular Mediterranean mild weather and routes with a perfect combination of sea and mountain!

programme.title: Kite Masters 2024 Episode 1
programme.desc: With Cagliari being considered as one of the best places for high-flying on-water action, it was only fitting for some elite up-and-coming competitors to finish off the 2023 season attending an event with innovative format that promotes sailing of the future and consolidates Cagliari and Sardinia as the capital of sailing. The 2024 season kicked off from Mar Menor, Spain, as this was the host of the 2024 Formula Kite Open European Championship.

programme.title: One Water Race 2023 - The Film
programme.desc: One Water Race is an endurance race based on Running, Swimming and Orienteering. 7 mixed teams of 7 athletes have to cross the Stockholm-Sweden archipelago from North to South in a non-stop 250 km race with 200 km of running and 50 km of swimming. They have to completely handle their navigation including in the darkness.

programme.title: GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships Gran Canaria 2024
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Tour returns once again to Gran Canaria. The world’s top wingfoil athletes will battle for glory at the one-stop Big Air world championships which return to the Spanish island of Gran Canaria for the second straight year after the spectacular discipline debuted there 12 months ago.

programme.title: Promo 1 Mtb Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: GKA Qatar Airways Big Air Kite World Championships Gran Canaria 2024
programme.desc: The GKA Big Air Kite World Championships is to debut at the notoriously windy spot of Salinas de Tenefé for the second and closing call, where the world champions in the twin-tip discipline will be crowned.

programme.title: Hugo & Max - The Grand Slam
programme.desc: During the 2022 season of ÖTILLÖ Swimrun the French-Swedish duo Hugo Tormento and Max Andersson set out on the quest to not only win ÖTILLÖ The Swimrun World Championship but to win every single race in the whole World Series. Seven in total.

programme.title: Promo 2 Running Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Birna. The Woman Who Swims In Ice
programme.desc: Icelandic ice swimmer Birna Hrönn swims in freezing lakes and seas of Iceland and swimming - without the use of a wetsuit - distances that would seem impossible. We follow Birna as she explores new places to swim and recounts her life, her love of the outdoors and her devotion to the sport of ice swimming. With comments by Ram Barkai, Chairman of the International Ice Swimming Association, on the effects of cold water immersion on the human body, the film shows that nothing is impossible.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Tarifa Spain (Eng)
programme.desc: The 2024 season of the GWA Wingfoil World Tour had its second stop at Tarifa, Spain. What better place than the iconic location of Tarifa, Spain to host the GWA Wingfoil World Cup. Perfect poniente wind conditions for the competition and great skills were to be seen on the water.

programme.title: The Swimsmith
programme.desc: Join Roderick Smith aka 'Shrek' who is going for what no one has done before --- Triple Crown of Swimming and Ultra Man races. A regular guy with the focus of a superhero, Shrek aims to complete the Triple Crown of Open Water Swimming : Manhattan Island, NewYork - 45kms (Aug 2017) Catalina Channel - 33kms - (Sept 2017) English Channel - 33kms - (July 2018). This documentary is the first part of his journey ... next challenge is the English Channel and the second attempt at Catalina. Once complete Shrek will be the only human to have completed the Triple Crown and done two Ultra Man races.

programme.title: Lords of Tram GKA Big-Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Barcarès France
programme.desc: The first Twin-Tip Big-Air Kite event of the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 takes place in Barcarès, France. The sixth edition of the Lords of Tram sees 24 men and 12 women compete in the opening round of the GKA Big-Air Kite World Championship title race. The event is named after the famously strong Tramontana winds that blow down from the Pyrenees over the shallow waters of the Barcarès lagoon.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour hits Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in 2023 for a Kite-Surf world cup event! The second stop of wave tour to debut in Rio de Janeiro with top athletes slated to battle for glory in renowned break. The tour leaders stamped their claim on the crown in the pure wave surfing contest in the legendary break of Cape Verde’s Ponta Preta. But the swell and wind in Saquarema can vary, with the effect that the contest may feature a mix of pure wave kite-surfing and strapless surfboard tricks, depending on the conditions. Thirty-five of the world’s best kite-surfing athletes—25 men and 10 women—from 14 nations around the globe are slated to battle for the crown in Saquarema. The spot on Saquarema’s Itauna Beach, a World Surf League stop last year, has a 12-day competition window to allow for the best possible conditions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The legendary waves of Cape Verde are set to be the stage for the opening round of the Wave discipline on the GWA Wingfoil World Tour, kick-starting the 2024 season. Reigning GWA Wave world champions, Cape Verde’s Wesley Brito and the US’s Moona Whyte, are slated to open the defence of the titles they clinched in the ground-breaking discipline’s first year in 2023.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is excited to return to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to kick off the 2024 season with the Kite-Surf discipline. Cape Verde is one of the best wave locations in the world and has been hosting numerous historical events over a number of years.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Following the exhilarating event in Cagliari, the grand finale of the 2023 KiteFoil World Series unfolded in Zhuhai, China. Drawing top international riders from around the globe, the Lakewood Hills KiteFoil World Series China became the epicenter of anticipation. Riders ventured to Zhuhai, fueled by the prospect of fierce competition in this dynamic venue. Throughout 2023, Kite Masters continued to showcase the epitome of kiteboarding excellence on your TV screens. The sport's evolution is evident with each passing year, mirrored by the advancing skills of the riders. In our coverage, we witnessed the next generation of exceptionally talented athletes, capturing the thrilling moments from both the Formula Kite Youth European and World Championships. The action unfolded, reflecting the continuous progression of the sport and the remarkable skills of these emerging kiteboarding talents.

programme.title: All The Way (Eng)
programme.desc: From award-winning documentary filmmaker Carl Eneroth at Sthlm Social Innovation Lab comes "All the Way". A heart-pounding, intimate and mind expanding portrait of Swimrun team Pontus Lindberg and George Bjälkemo, as they prepare for their ultimate challenge… winning the 75 km ÖtillÖ Swimrun World Championships in the Stockholm archipelago… in trail shoes and a wetsuit.

programme.title: Tisa with Edita Vopatova
programme.desc: Climbing instructor Edita Vopatova explains the climbing area she nows very well nearby the village of Tisa in the North of Bohemia in Czech Republic. The area is a paradise for climbers with lots of rocks between 20 and 30 meter high. Edita climbs the Heuréka route on a Great Tisa Rock and the Doga Tower.

programme.title: Krkavka with Vojta Trojan
programme.desc: Pro climber Vojta Trojan climbs and explains the difficulties of some climbing route in the area of Krkavka near Zelezny in Czech Republic. This area has some of the best climbing spots with difficult routes between 6 and 9a. Celebrity Adam Ondra has climbed here several times.

programme.title: Margalef - Climbing
programme.desc: Margalef is a little village next to the Monsant river, in Catalunya. The most amazing rocks in Europe and hundreds routes for climbing. Pure fun and climbing in this little entertaining film.

programme.title: Summiting Mt Sneffels in Colorado (Eng)
programme.desc: Mount Sneffels is a prominent mountain near Ouray, Colorado in the United States which is over 14,000 feet high, more than 4,300 metres. Audree had never climbed a 14er, so we decided to try reach its summit while on a road trip through Colorado in late-July.

programme.title: Aussie 8
programme.desc: Aussie 8 is the adventure of 3 friends who decided to climb the 8 tallest mountains in 8 Australian states in 8 days. To make this possible, they had to put together and respect a very strict timing and logistic organisation.

programme.title: Nadelhorn Via Normal Route - The Best Alpine Experience
programme.desc: Cris and Viv are hiking to the summit of Nadelhorn (4,327 m), which lies in the Mischabel group in Switzerland. We follow their adventure from the village of Saas-Fee to the Mischabel Hut, a mountain hut that lies at an elevation of 3,340 meters and that has beautiful views of Lenzspitze, Dom, Nadelhorn, Weissmies, and many other 4000-meter peaks. And finally after having crossed the Hohbalmgletscher, they go over the North-East ridge to get to the summit of Nadelhorn which offers superb views of the Alps and their summits such as the Weisshorn and the famous Matterhorn.

programme.title: Nine Mountains
programme.desc: The journey of two cyclists (Leo Russell & George Stagg) on a mission to climb the 9 most challenging and notorious mountains in Europe. From Austria To Spain, Nine Mountains is an adventure of brutality and beauty exploring the limits of the mind and body. The boys cycled over 3,200km from blistering snowstorms to scorching deserts whilst ascending the equivalent of eight times the height of Everest. The film follows a never been done route with the aim to raise £100,000 towards men's mental health charity James' Place, an organisation set up to help men in suicidal crisis.

programme.title: Best Via Ferrata In The Dolomites Climbing Possnecker
programme.desc: Cris and Viv climb Piz Selva, a 2,941m mountain belonging to the Sella group, an iconic giant of the Dolomites.They start their hike from Passo Sella, and their chosen route was via Ferrata Possnecker (also called Ferrata delle Mesules), one of the oldest Via Ferratas in the Dolomites.

programme.title: The High Pass
programme.desc: Annapurna Circuit trek in central Nepal climbs to an altitude of 5,400m through Thorung La pass, one of the highest trekking passes in the world, below peaks that rise 6000-8000m in elevation from the Annapurna Range. We attempted to complete the trek in about 15 days starting mid-December, when the shoulder season promised much smaller crowds but with it a risk of deep snow that early winter can bring to the Pass. (Subtitles in French, Italian and English)

programme.title: Climbing Skye's Highest Peak - Sgurr Alasdair
programme.desc: Cris and Viv decided to climb Sgurr Alasdair, the highest mountain on the island of Skye, located in an area of the mountain range known as Black Cullin. The main challenge they had in climbing the peak was the Great Stone Chute. A 300-meter slope of the harshest mountain terrain - scree. The summit of Sgurr Alasdair has unobstructed views of all of the Munroes in the Black Cullin, and also of one of Skye's most famous routes - The Cullin Ridge traverse.

programme.title: Open Faces Obertauern 2024
programme.desc: The 4*Freeride World Tour Challenger provides the big stage for the final decisions for qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2025. This international freeride contest is taking place in Obertauern for the first time and offers ideal conditions for this event with numerous freeride options.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Snowboard Finals are an iconic event in the world of youth snowboarding, where emerging athletes have the chance to test themselves and compete against the best in their category becoming a star! The Finals are back in style at the historic location of Kitzsteinhorn Zell am See-Kaprun, for a six-day contest and non-stop activities, providing an exceptional setting and unparalleled snow conditions for this high-level competition. This prestigious event determines the new 2024 World Rookie Champions title for Snowboard Halfpipe and Slopestyle, who earn the opportunity to participate in renowned international competitions and training camps in 2024.

programme.title: Open Faces 2024 Montafon
programme.desc: The Freeride Contest in Montafon (AUT) offers even more of the world's best freeriders who will be at the start of the 4* contest. The terrain surrounding "little Heimspitze" in the Silvretta-Montafon region will be the venue for this years Open Faces Freeride Contest in Vorarlberg. This 4* FWT qualifier offers riders 2500 point and a rich prize money for a victory.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

programme.title: The Best Hike In Switzerland - Zermatt to Mettelhorn (Eng)
programme.desc: Mettelhorn and Platthorn are hidden gems as a one-day out-and-back hiking/mountaineering trip from Zermatt. It's a good route to help acclimatise to bigger mountains in the area. The route starts from the northern outskirts of Zermatt, Switzerland's picturesque ski resort town, taking paths that zig-zag up the mountain and take you to some stunning Alpine views of famous mountains like the Matterhorn, Zinalrothorn, and Weisshorn. The journey to Mettelhorn was a unique Alpine experience that doesn't pack the same effort punch that lies in most Mountaineering routes while still delivering spectacular mountain views

programme.title: A Feather in the West
programme.desc: In September 2019, a team of talented Irish climbers [Chloe Condron, Kevin Kilroy, Michelle O'Loughlin and Conor McGovern] travelled to the small island of Owey to explore sea cliffs that local guidebook writer Iain Miller claims, have “enough new routing potential to last at least twelve lifetimes”. ‘A Feather in the West’ is a film about their trad climbing experiences and the relatively niche pursuit of first ascents, set on the Wild Atlantic Way, off the west coast of County Donegal. (Special thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Running & Walking
programme.desc: Infinite Nordic walking, hiking, running, trail running, ultra-marathons in natural surroundings ... races, documentaries, exploration ... to get away from the real world.

programme.title: Arctic Race Of Norway 2024
programme.desc: The Arctic Race of Norway (ARN) is a four-day road race held every year in August in Northern Norway’s magnificent scenery. Created in 2013, the event has continuously developed and is now established as Scandinavia’s main international cycling event, and one of Norway’s most important sports events. Thanks to its high level of organizational, media and sporting performance, the event is part of the UCI ProSeries, the second highest division of cycling races. Each year, several Tour de France teams and some of the world’s greatest cycling stars participate in the ARN and fight for the race’s iconic prizes. One of the event’s fundamental values is to federate across geographical and political barriers. The ARN is a free, accessible and inclusive event. It does not require any important infrastructure or facility but uses the most beautiful stadium in the world: the stunning roads of Northern Norway.

programme.title: Inside Atlas Mountain Race
programme.desc: The Atlas Mountain Race is a 1300 km fixed route, unsupported, single-stage ultra cycling race that starts in Marrakesh, crosses the Moroccan Atlas before taking riders through the Anti-Atlas and on to Essaouira. The clock does not stop and there are no prizes. It follows gravel, single and double track and old colonial pistes that have long been forgotten and fallen into disrepair. There is very little tarmac. We follow Josh during his adventure and suffering on this ultra cycling challenge.

programme.title: Mental Miles - The Film
programme.desc: Through the eyes and team of Australian cycling journalist and author Rupert Guinness, the Virtual Race Across America delivers over 4,500km’s and 73,000 mtrs of climbing in World’s First & Largest Virtual Ultra Cycling Event, VRAAM. Come on a journey like never before, witnessing the highs and lows of taking on such an incredible challenge on a stationery bike. 20 hours a day for 12 days straight, Rupert will be joined by riders from over 30 countries who will also tackle VRAAM from the relative comfort of their living rooms, garages and pain caves. Why do this? Quite simply to give people hope all over the world in extraordinary times.

programme.title: More Than Miles
programme.desc: More than Miles - A journey across America. Race Across America (RAAM) is the world's toughest bicycle race. Competitors challenge themselves and their support crews from the West to East Coast of the USA in a non stop 3089 mile journey. In this film we follow the teams that comprise 4 riders as they race in a relay format in the quest for glory.

programme.title: Salomon Community Run New Caledonia
programme.desc: Salomon Trail Runner Elite Vladimir Shatrov runs on one of the Worlds most challenging and brutal races. The New Caledonia Ultra Trail covers over 130km with 6500 meters of climbs across this stunning terrain. Follow the drama and hard lessons learned in this remote paradise.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2024 Race Recaps - Episode 3 Mont-Blanc Marathon (Eng)
programme.desc: Fourth stop of Golden Trail World Series was held in Chamonix, France with the Mont Blanc Marathon, a 42km race with 2540 meters elevation gain. In this very tactical race, the battle between the leaders was fierce until the last kilometers.

programme.title: Promo 1 Mtb Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: The High
programme.desc: THE HIGH is a feature length documentary film about the making of the longest high altitude foot race in the world. The film follows the path of a group of extreme runners who individually decide to take part of a dangerous running experiment gone wrong. Indian race director Rajat Chauhan works against the advice of the military, his family and friends to create a race over the two highest passes in the world (above 17 500ft). The decline begins from the start, with runners collapsing from dehydration, hypothermia, and high-altitude sickness. And by its end finds the entire race in jeopardy and the prospect that no one finishes. Brought to life by archive footage, story recreations, and interviews, the film unfolds the events in the Himalayas of Northern India and gives a unique look into the lives of the extreme marathon runners involved. Uncovering the avalanches, athletes, and the high altitude elements. THE HIGH shows the rewards of determination, the dangers of obsession, and in the end leaves you with the answer of why they called it, the toughest race on earth. Directed by Barry Walton.

programme.title: Adamello Ultra Trail 2023 - 170 km
programme.desc: The Adamello Ultra-Trail® is a trail running race of 170 km in length and about 11,500 m of elevation gain, to be covered in semi-self-sufficiency, organized by the ASD Adamello Ultra-Trail in collaboration with the Union of the Upper Camonica Valley Municipalities. The maximum time allowed to finish the race is 53 hours.

programme.title: Transvulcania 2024
programme.desc: La Palma, the northernmost of the 8 Canary Islands welcomes since 2009 The Transvulcania Adidas Terrex Ultra Marathon. 2800 runners from all over the world compete in one of the four races, Half marathon, marathon, ultra marathon and vertical Km.

programme.title: Golden Trail World Series 2024 Race Recaps - Episode 2 Zegama
programme.desc: The Zegama-Aizkorri marathon is the third race of the Golden Trail World Series. Zegama is in the northern end of the Pyrenees and It has its own language and unique culture. The race is one of the most popular in the world because of the insane crowd. Fans of trail running come every year on the famous part of the race from Sancti Spiritu segment to the Aizkorri summit to support and cheer on the runners. The race’s distance is 42 km with 2736 meters of accumulated height gain.

programme.title: X-out Montenegro
programme.desc: X-out Montenegro is part of the Xtri World Tour. Athletes starts with a 1.7 km open-water course. The race is started by the Xekutioner, a formidable figure who will be responsible for future eliminations. 15% of athletes will be eliminated by the Xekutioner, intensifying the competition. Eliminated athletes are given a time penatly and can then try to catch “The Splitter” to ovetake backmarkers and get back in the race! Then a tough and demanding 40 km asphalt cycle which climbs the famous serpentine above Kotor. Designed to test endurance to the max. Another 15% of athletes are eliminated by the Xekutioner here, ensuring only the toughest stay. Finally 6.5 km of downhill trail running and 2.5 km of “vertical” monster climbing. Again eliminated athletes have the opportunity to catch the leaders.

programme.title: Trail Menorca Cami De Cavalls 2024
programme.desc: Can you imagine waking up, preparing your backpack, putting on your trainers and running 185 km around the Island of Menorca, with a cumulative elevation gain of 3,500 metres? This is the what awaits you in the Trail Menorca Camí de Cavalls, one of the longest Trail races in Europe and one of the most attractive challenges you can face today. If you prefer you can run shorter distances as there are 5 other races (27, 45, 58, 85 and 100 km)

programme.title: Promo 2 Running Horizonsports 30 Sec
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Trans Sahara Marathon 2024
programme.desc: The Trans Sahara Marathon. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of the Sahara Desert, this epic race, held in March 2024, challenges runners to traverse 150 kilometers across four grueling stages of unforgiving terrain. Drawing the world's top athletes from every corner of the globe, the Trans Sahara Marathon is more than just a race; it's a testament to the boundless limits of human potential and the relentless pursuit of greatness.

programme.title: Horizonsports 2021 - Promo
programme.desc: HorizonSports !

programme.title: Cavaioni Bologna Hike
programme.desc: Hike eat hike from the city of Bologna, Italy to the Cavaioni park in the wild hills south of the city . Its a wonderful and eventful 15km round trip hike with a 500 meter climb.... Une randonnée depuis la ville de Bologne, en Italie, jusqu'au parc Cavaioni dans les collines sauvages au sud de la ville. C'est une randonnée merveilleuse et mouvementée de 15 km aller-retour avec 500 mètres de dénivelé positif. Escursione dalla città di Bologna, Italia, al parco Cavaioni nelle selvagge colline a sud della città. È una meravigliosa e movimentata escursione di andata e ritorno di 15 km con una salita di 500 metri....

programme.title: Epic Azores (Eng)
programme.desc: The Azores Islands are a Portuguese archipelago in the middle of the Atlantic ocean. Jeff visited in December of 2022 to run the 60k EPIC Azores trail race on Sao Miguel Island where he'd end up having to battle some pretty tough conditions. He then stayed for two weeks to soak in as much as he could of all the Islands have to offer, including its rugged coastlines, green pastures, lake-filled calderas, and local cuisine.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2024 Episode 1
programme.desc: With Cagliari being considered as one of the best places for high-flying on-water action, it was only fitting for some elite up-and-coming competitors to finish off the 2023 season attending an event with innovative format that promotes sailing of the future and consolidates Cagliari and Sardinia as the capital of sailing. This documentary is the first part of his journey ... next challenge is the English Channel and the second attempt at Catalina. Once complete Shrek will be the only human to have completed the Triple Crown and done two Ultra Man races.

programme.title: Lords of Tram GKA Big-Air Kite World Cup 2024 - Barcarès France
programme.desc: The first Twin-Tip Big-Air Kite event of the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 takes place in Barcarès, France. The sixth edition of the Lords of Tram sees 24 men and 12 women compete in the opening round of the GKA Big-Air Kite World Championship title race. The event is named after the famously strong Tramontana winds that blow down from the Pyrenees over the shallow waters of the Barcarès lagoon.

programme.title: Copa Kitley Qatar Airways GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2023
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour hits Rio de Janeiro in Brazil in 2023 for a Kite-Surf world cup event! The second stop of wave tour to debut in Rio de Janeiro with top athletes slated to battle for glory in renowned break. The tour leaders stamped their claim on the crown in the pure wave surfing contest in the legendary break of Cape Verde’s Ponta Preta. But the swell and wind in Saquarema can vary, with the effect that the contest may feature a mix of pure wave kite-surfing and strapless surfboard tricks, depending on the conditions. Thirty-five of the world’s best kite-surfing athletes—25 men and 10 women—from 14 nations around the globe are slated to battle for the crown in Saquarema. The spot on Saquarema’s Itauna Beach, a World Surf League stop last year, has a 12-day competition window to allow for the best possible conditions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The legendary waves of Cape Verde are set to be the stage for the opening round of the Wave discipline on the GWA Wingfoil World Tour, kick-starting the 2024 season. Reigning GWA Wave world champions, Cape Verde’s Wesley Brito and the US’s Moona Whyte, are slated to open the defence of the titles they clinched in the ground-breaking discipline’s first year in 2023.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup Cape Verde 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is excited to return to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to kick off the 2024 season with the Kite-Surf discipline. Cape Verde is one of the best wave locations in the world and has been hosting numerous historical events over a number of years.

programme.title: Kite Masters 2023 - Episode 6
programme.desc: Following the exhilarating event in Cagliari, the grand finale of the 2023 KiteFoil World Series unfolded in Zhuhai, China. Drawing top international riders from around the globe, the Lakewood Hills KiteFoil World Series China became the epicenter of anticipation. Riders ventured to Zhuhai, fueled by the prospect of fierce competition in this dynamic venue. Throughout 2023, Kite Masters continued to showcase the epitome of kiteboarding excellence on your TV screens. The sport's evolution is evident with each passing year, mirrored by the advancing skills of the riders. In our coverage, we witnessed the next generation of exceptionally talented athletes, capturing the thrilling moments from both the Formula Kite Youth European and World Championships. The action unfolded, reflecting the continuous progression of the sport and the remarkable skills of these emerging kiteboarding talents.

programme.title: All The Way (Eng)
programme.desc: From award-winning documentary filmmaker Carl Eneroth at Sthlm Social Innovation Lab comes "All the Way". A heart-pounding, intimate and mind expanding portrait of Swimrun team Pontus Lindberg and George Bjälkemo, as they prepare for their ultimate challenge… winning the 75 km ÖtillÖ Swimrun World Championships in the Stockholm archipelago… in trail shoes and a wetsuit.

programme.title: Tisa with Edita Vopatova
programme.desc: Climbing instructor Edita Vopatova explains the climbing area she nows very well nearby the village of Tisa in the North of Bohemia in Czech Republic. The area is a paradise for climbers with lots of rocks between 20 and 30 meter high. Edita climbs the Heuréka route on a Great Tisa Rock and the Doga Tower.

programme.title: Krkavka with Vojta Trojan
programme.desc: Pro climber Vojta Trojan climbs and explains the difficulties of some climbing route in the area of Krkavka near Zelezny in Czech Republic. This area has some of the best climbing spots with difficult routes between 6 and 9a. Celebrity Adam Ondra has climbed here several times.

programme.title: Margalef - Climbing
programme.desc: Margalef is a little village next to the Monsant river, in Catalunya. The most amazing rocks in Europe and hundreds routes for climbing. Pure fun and climbing in this little entertaining film.

programme.title: Summiting Mt Sneffels in Colorado (Eng)
programme.desc: Mount Sneffels is a prominent mountain near Ouray, Colorado in the United States which is over 14,000 feet high, more than 4,300 metres. Audree had never climbed a 14er, so we decided to try reach its summit while on a road trip through Colorado in late-July.

programme.title: Aussie 8
programme.desc: Aussie 8 is the adventure of 3 friends who decided to climb the 8 tallest mountains in 8 Australian states in 8 days. To make this possible, they had to put together and respect a very strict timing and logistic organisation.

programme.title: Nadelhorn Via Normal Route - The Best Alpine Experience
programme.desc: Cris and Viv are hiking to the summit of Nadelhorn (4,327 m), which lies in the Mischabel group in Switzerland. We follow their adventure from the village of Saas-Fee to the Mischabel Hut, a mountain hut that lies at an elevation of 3,340 meters and that has beautiful views of Lenzspitze, Dom, Nadelhorn, Weissmies, and many other 4000-meter peaks. And finally after having crossed the Hohbalmgletscher, they go over the North-East ridge to get to the summit of Nadelhorn which offers superb views of the Alps and their summits such as the Weisshorn and the famous Matterhorn.

programme.title: Nine Mountains
programme.desc: The journey of two cyclists (Leo Russell & George Stagg) on a mission to climb the 9 most challenging and notorious mountains in Europe. From Austria To Spain, Nine Mountains is an adventure of brutality and beauty exploring the limits of the mind and body. The boys cycled over 3,200km from blistering snowstorms to scorching deserts whilst ascending the equivalent of eight times the height of Everest. The film follows a never been done route with the aim to raise £100,000 towards men's mental health charity James' Place, an organisation set up to help men in suicidal crisis.

programme.title: Best Via Ferrata In The Dolomites Climbing Possnecker
programme.desc: Cris and Viv climb Piz Selva, a 2,941m mountain belonging to the Sella group, an iconic giant of the Dolomites.They start their hike from Passo Sella, and their chosen route was via Ferrata Possnecker (also called Ferrata delle Mesules), one of the oldest Via Ferratas in the Dolomites.

programme.title: The High Pass
programme.desc: Annapurna Circuit trek in central Nepal climbs to an altitude of 5,400m through Thorung La pass, one of the highest trekking passes in the world, below peaks that rise 6000-8000m in elevation from the Annapurna Range. We attempted to complete the trek in about 15 days starting mid-December, when the shoulder season promised much smaller crowds but with it a risk of deep snow that early winter can bring to the Pass. (Subtitles in French, Italian and English)

programme.title: Climbing Skye's Highest Peak - Sgurr Alasdair
programme.desc: Cris and Viv decided to climb Sgurr Alasdair, the highest mountain on the island of Skye, located in an area of the mountain range known as Black Cullin. The main challenge they had in climbing the peak was the Great Stone Chute. A 300-meter slope of the harshest mountain terrain - scree. The summit of Sgurr Alasdair has unobstructed views of all of the Munroes in the Black Cullin, and also of one of Skye's most famous routes - The Cullin Ridge traverse.

programme.title: Open Faces Obertauern 2024
programme.desc: The 4*Freeride World Tour Challenger provides the big stage for the final decisions for qualification for the Freeride World Tour 2025. This international freeride contest is taking place in Obertauern for the first time and offers ideal conditions for this event with numerous freeride options.

programme.title: World Rookie Snowboard Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Snowboard Finals are an iconic event in the world of youth snowboarding, where emerging athletes have the chance to test themselves and compete against the best in their category becoming a star! The Finals are back in style at the historic location of Kitzsteinhorn Zell am See-Kaprun, for a six-day contest and non-stop activities, providing an exceptional setting and unparalleled snow conditions for this high-level competition. This prestigious event determines the new 2024 World Rookie Champions title for Snowboard Halfpipe and Slopestyle, who earn the opportunity to participate in renowned international competitions and training camps in 2024.

programme.title: Open Faces 2024 Montafon
programme.desc: The Freeride Contest in Montafon (AUT) offers even more of the world's best freeriders who will be at the start of the 4* contest. The terrain surrounding "little Heimspitze" in the Silvretta-Montafon region will be the venue for this years Open Faces Freeride Contest in Vorarlberg. This 4* FWT qualifier offers riders 2500 point and a rich prize money for a victory.

programme.title: Backcountry skiing at Mcgillivray Lodge (Eng)
programme.desc: In March of 2021, Jeff and a group of friends took a helicopter from Pemberton, which is about 2 hours north of Vancouver, to an area called Whitecap Alpine to stay in the backcountry at McGillivray Pass Lodge for 4 nights and experience 4 great days of backcountry skiing.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

His success spreads wildly. After finding a possible way home, he must decide where home really is, and finds that one's place in the world is all a state of mind.

The lo-fi, cult, surf action, adventure, dramatic, sci-fi, fantasy, bro-mantic, comedy, feel good, B-movie of outer limits hi-fi shredding, and interstellar tube time with Ozzie Wright, Mitch Coleborn & Noa Deane on a feverish trip that quickly unravels into the most bizarre experience of their lives… and ultimately a mission to rescue Mitch. programme.title: Lines
programme.desc: Lines is a documentary on Big Mountain snowboarding that shows the dedication and nerve that goes into this under-represented side of snowboarding. It loosely follows the Absinthe Films crew as they post up in Haines, Alaska for 6 weeks and shows how taking freestyle into Big Mountain riding is the ultimate form of snowboarding. In between the current action, the movie fills out the characters with a historical look at the development of Big Mountain riding with the true legendary freeride pioneers. The film gives an inside look at the characters, history, dangers and logistics of Big Mountain riding, painting colorful and classic riding stories from past and present. "A powerful, deeply moving film that takes you on a stirring journey straight to your heart." – Travis Rice “Big Mountain riding is the most visually stunning aspect of snowboarding, yet it remains the least understood. With Lines, Axel Pauporté has removed the sixty degrees of separation that exists between the weekend warrior and the Alaskan Warrlords. Riders like Nicolas Müller, Jeremy Jones, Travis Rice and Mike Ranquet tell it like it is and explain that more often than not, Big Mountain riding is gnarly, scary, sketchy and the ultimate snowboarding thrill.”

programme.title: Mission Antarctic
programme.desc: Mission Antarctic - by Timeline Missions & Camp 4 Collective. In 2008 Xavier de Le Rue, multiple freeride world champion and two times Olympian returned from a trip to Antarctica with mixed feelings, although he had the experience of a lifetime and discovered a new paradise he believed he had only scratched the surface of it. Since then, he worked on going back with his filming crew on a small boat to be completely independent. This documentary is about an expedition to the world’s end, a fair mix of navigation, mountaineering, snowboarding, wild life and unexpected discoveries. Release: 2013 Production: TimeLine Missions in collaboration with Camp 4 Collective Starring: Xavier de Le Rue & Lucas Debari Original Score by: Aidan Lavelle & James Carroll courtesy of Relentless. Supported by The North Face & Swatch.

Truly one of the greats. Thanks for coming on boss. Enjoy!

programme.title: Drawn From Here
programme.desc: Named Powder Magazine's "Movie of the Year" #DrawnFromHere is a film by Eric Pollard that opens with an exploration of his processes as a skier, as a ski/product designer, and as an artist. It follows the influences he draws from—like basing the shape of a ski tip off of a surfboard or finding patterns observed in nature to integrate into the graphics he hand draws for a ski—and illuminates a thread that runs through and binds all his different disciplines and hobbies. About Eric Pollard: EP is a professional skier, artist, and designer from Welches, Oregon. For 20 of his 36 years he’s been professionally sponsored as a skier, but what defines the whole of his career over that time goes well beyond that one simple fact.
